name: Walk-Back
description:
In this game you play as a man who is forced to participate in an experiment against his will. He must open a door and go through it by only controlling his movement half the time, the other half is controlled by a playback (or rewind if you will) of the last actions played.

This is our submission for the second  Brackeys game jam on 2020.

We are a team of three, two programmers and a musician, and were using the Godot game engine to make this game.
